parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the windshield wipers can lead to reduced visibility during rainy or snowy conditions, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: windshield wipers quit working in the middle of operation
windshield wipers need to be turned off and back on to work

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the defroster/defogger can lead to reduced visibility, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Defroster/defogger does not clear the windshield properly

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the seat bracket can cause the driver's seat to move forward and backward without warning, which can lead to loss of control, accidents, and injuries.
symptoms: The driver's seat moves forward and backward without warning
the seat rocks or shifts when braking
the seat is not firmly secured
the seat has a loose or unstable feeling.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Failure of Driver's Side Airbag to Deploy
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the driver's side airbag to deploy in a front-end collision can increase the risk of injury or fatality to the driver, compromising vehicle safety.
symptoms: The airbag does not deploy in a front-end collision
despite the severity of the impact meeting the deployment threshold.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake pedal to respond can cause the vehicle to lose braking ability, leading to accidents or near-misses, potentially resulting in serious injury or death.
symptoms: The brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle does not stop or slow down when the brakes are applied
the ABS system fails to respond properly
the vehicle loses control or runs off the road.
